title: Which is an example of a compulsion

content.prompt: Which of the following is an example of a compulsion?

choices.label: Checking the doors twenty times before going to bed
Refusing to leave the home because of worry about having a panic attack

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
